Delicious!! Very delicious!
I hate fish, so I was nervous and almost bought vegan gummies, but these were much less expensive and taste perfectly fine
Great tasting, family loves it
This isn’t going to provide any of the benefits Omega 3 seems to provide… the amount per serving is negligible. If you’re concerned about supplementing, best to opt for a pill and not a gummy
Tasty but would prefer size bigger than 1 month
Finally found a fish oil that doesn't make me burp up that nasty fish taste. They are a delicious orange flavor. Even the kids like them
I loved these. And so disappointed that Amazon no long carries these. I tried these because my other brand was out of stock. Now they no longer have them. So sad

Good health - small and easy to chew
Good flavor (no fishy taste) and stays soft
Good taste
These are the best tasting Omega gummies I've ever had! And they're not covered in sugar, but they taste sweet and have a great orange flavor. Makes taking fish oil very enjoyable

It taste great just like orange juice to me. My twin daughter thought it had a fishy smell. So in order to get her to take it, I would put two gummy‘s in some water in the microwave for approximately two minutes then pour it into her orange juice dinner time. She was none the wiser and did not complain about a fishy taste or smell
I don’t eat enough fish and decided to try these gummies. I’ve tried others but they had an awful fishy taste. These were a sweet treat
Pain relief
I’m not sure how to review these since I have no way to tell if they work. They taste great but the texture threw me off. They are soft, not really gummy, but once I got used to that they were good
I can’t swallow pills and I love the chewable omega. Taste really good. I could eat more ;) I made a good purchase. I would subscribe to them monthly if offered
These gummies taste very good, even my kids like them
My husband has used fish oil gummies for a while as doesn't like swallowing pills. He likes the taste of these and good price. Pleased!
I prefer edible vitamins. I have taken fish oil pills before, but I highly recommend these
